SENT.plain: We investigated the frequency of amyloidosis in 99 consecutive patients (65 men and 34 women) with Behçet's syndrome
Rectal biopsies performed on all patients showed no amyloidosis by polarizing microscopy
The results of urinalyses were normal in all patients
Among 1,130 patients registered in our Behçet's syndrome outpatient clinic, 5 were found to have systemic amyloidosis, all of the AA type
